name: Macaroni Salad
ingredients: 7 ounces Box elbow macaroni cooked ½ c. mayonnaise
2 ribs celery minced fine ¼ tsp. black pepper
1 Tbsp. dry minced onion ¼ tsp. dry mustard
1/3 cup diced sweet pickles 1 tsp. sugar
1 ½ c. Miracle Whip salt and pepper to taste
steps: Combine everything just as listed. Refrigerate salad tightly.
